columnParam.description: The result will be sorted by the given column
columnParam.name: column

countParam.description: Returns a integer which represents the total count of the result
countParam.name: count

downloadParam.description: Triggers the file download of the given request
downloadParam.name: download

exportParam.description: Result will be downloaded in the given format.
exportParam.name: export

filterParam.description: Specify request with custom SQL filter method.
filterParam.name: filter

firstParam.description: List of results start with given ID
firstParam.name: first

formatParam.description: Select to which output format is prefered
formatParam.name: format

geometryParam.description: Filter, which geometric entities will be retrieved through /geometric_entities
geometryParam.name: geometry

lastParam.description: List of results start with entity after given ID
lastParam.name: last

limitParam.description: Integer of entities returned per page. 0 means no limit is set. Default is 20.
limitParam.name: limit

searchParam.description: Search request with AND/OR logic. Confer https://redmine.craws.net/projects/uni/wiki/API_03#Search
searchParam.name: search

showParam.description: Select which key should be shown. If 'not' is used, no other keys will be shown
showParam.name: show

sortParam.description: Result will be sorted asc/desc (default column is name)
sortParam.name: sort

typeParam.description: The output will be filtered by the type_id. Only entities with this type ids will be display. The relation is in logical OR.
typeParam.name: type_id

info.description: This is the unstable version of the OpenAtlas API
info.title: OpenAtlas Api

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their CIDOC CRM class code. The json contains a **result** and **pagination** key. All in OpenAtlas available codes can be found under `https://redmine.craws.net/projects/uni/wiki/OpenAtlas_and_CIDOC_CRM_class_mapping`. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.description: Need to be a valid CIDOC CRM class code (e.g. E21, E18, E33)
parameters.name: cidoc_class

200.description: A json with a list of results and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Provides a list of all available system classes, their CIDOC CRM mapping, which view they belong, which icon is used and the englisch name

200.description: List of all available system classes

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json of the content (Intro, Legal Notice, Contact and the size for processed images) from the OpenAtlas instance. The language can be choosen with the **lang** parameter (en or de).

200.description: Json of OpenAtlas content (Intro, Legal Notice and Contact)

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities, which are linked to the entered entity. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a geojson representations of an entity through the **id**.

200.description: A geojson representation of the specified entity

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all selected geometries in the database in a standard Geojson format. This is implimentended for map usage.

200.description: Only places with geometries will retrieved.

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json of latest entries made in the OpenAtlas database. The number **latest** represents the amount of entities retrieved. **latest** can be any number between and including 1 and 100. The pagination information is alway `null`

parameters.description: The amount of last enterd entities to be retrieved (Valid numbers between and including 1 and 100)
parameters.name: latest

200.description: A json with a result list and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a list of Geojson representations by entity id, CIDOC CRM code or menu item

parameters.description: Need to be a entity class code of the CIDOC CRM (e.g. E21, E18, E33). For further information visit https://redmine.craws.net/projects/uni/wiki/OpenAtlas_and_CIDOC_CRM_class_mapping
parameters.name: cidoc_classes

parameters.description: Need to be an OpenAtlas menu items
parameters.name: view_classes

parameters.description: Need to be an OpenAtlas system class
parameters.name: system_classes

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Displays all subunits of a place in a special Thanados format

parameters.description: The ID of an place entity
parameters.name: id_

200.description: A list of all subunits of the given place

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their OpenAtlas system class. Available categories are **acquisition**, **activity**, **actor_appellation**, **administrative_unit**, **appellation**, **artifact**, **bibliography**, **edition**, **external_reference**, **feature**, **file**, , **group**, **human_remains**, **move**, **object_location**, **person**, **place**, **source**, **reference_system**, **stratigraphic_unit**, **source_translation**, **type**,  The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters.  By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.description: Need to be an OpenAtlas system class
parameters.name: system_class

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.
Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json list of all types sorted by view class

200.description: A list of all types sorted by view class

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their OpenAtlas type. A possible *id* can be obtained by the *type_tree* or *node_overview* endpoint. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.description: Has to be a OpenAtlas type
parameters.name: id_

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their OpenAtlas type. This endpoint also includes all entities, which are connected to an subtype. A possible *id* can be obtained by the *type_tree* or *node_overview* endpoint. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.description: Has to be a OpenAtlas type
parameters.name: id_

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json list of all types

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Shows every *Type* in the OA instance, with its root and subs, so a tree can be build

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.

get.description: Retrieves a json with a list of entities based on their OpenAtlas view class. Available categories are **actor**, **event**, **place**, **source**, **reference**, **object**. The result can also be filtered, ordered and manipulated through different parameters. By default results are orderd alphabetically and 20 entities are shown.

parameters.description: Need to be an OpenAtlas menu item
parameters.name: view_class

200.description: A dictionary with a result dictionary and pagination information

404.description: Something went wrong. Please consult the error message.
